medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain for the last day.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's abdominal pain began over the last day. He describes the pain in the left lower quadrant (LLQ) as different from his previous cramping. His condition has been accompanied by a decreased appetite in the past day.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of Crohn's disease diagnosed at a young age. Has not required maintenance therapy and has had no recent hospitalizations for Crohn's. Occasional abdominal cramping that alleviates with diet changes. Past medications include Cozaar, Allopurinol, Zyrtec.
